missionProperties.startingObjective: Retrieve your equipment from the equipment cache.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Flip all heroes' Item cards facedown. The heroes cannot use facedown cards. The neutral mission token represents the equipment cache. A hero can interact with the equipment cache to flip his items faceup.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move or to interact with the equipment cache.
{-} A hero without a weapon can attack an adjacent hostile figure with 1 green and 1 yellow die. Before this attack, the hero tests {K}. If he passes, the attack gains {B}: +2 {H}.
{-} The doors in the Storage Room and Hallway are locked. A door adjacent to an Imperial figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-} The mission will progress when all heroes flip their items faceup. The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to terminals and mission tokens.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You've been working for days on how to open your ce!!, but all of your equipment, except one well-hidden comlink, is gone.

You think it pretty hopeless until the facility shudders and the comlink crackles.

"In ten seconds," a voice comes through, "the door to your cell is going to open. Your equipment is being held just down the hall. Run there ... now!"

eventActions.theText:
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Flip all heroes' Item cards facedown. The heroes cannot use facedown cards. The neutral mission token represents the equipment cache. A hero can interact with the equipment cache to flip his items faceup.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move or to interact with the equipment cache.
{-} A hero without a weapon can attack an adjacent hostile figure with 1 green and 1 yellow die. Before this attack, the hero tests {K}. If he passes, the attack gains {B}: +2 {H}.
{-} The doors in the Storage Room and Hallway are locked. A door adjacent to an Imperial figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-} The mission will progress when all heroes flip their items faceup. The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Trash Compactor
globalEvents.eventText: The hatches to the Trash Compactor slide open.

entityProperties.name: Red Imperial Token 1
entityProperties.theText:
The entrance to the Trash Compactor is closed.

A hero can interact with the red terminal to open all entrances to the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Red Imperial Token 2
entityProperties.theText:
The entrance to the Trash Compactor is closed.

A hero can interact with the red terminal to open all entrances to the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Red Rebel Token 2
entityProperties.theText:
The entrance to the Trash Compactor is open.

{-} A hero can interact with this token to climb down into the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Red Rebel Token 1
entityProperties.theText:
The entrance to the Trash Compactor is open.

{-} A hero can interact with this token to climb down into the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Red Terminal
entityProperties.theText: The terminal controls the access hatches to the Trash Compactor.

eventActions.theText:
You attempt to hack into the terminal.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} to the test for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The security systems protecting the terminal are too strong. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

entityProperties.name: Trash Compactor Door
entityProperties.theText: This rusty door is clearly designed to shield the hallway from the fumes of the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText: This terminal controls the garbage chute that leads out of the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Terminal 2
entityProperties.theText: This terminal controls the garbage chute that leads out of the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Cell Door
entityProperties.theText: The prison cell door appears solid, but is has been weakened by your work.

globalEvents.name: Mission Ends - Rebel win
globalEvents.eventText:
Sliding through the filth and muck, you come across other Rebel prisoners recently freed. Working together, you overpower the Imperial forces in your way. Following the instructions of your rescuer, you lead them out and pile into a transport sorne distance away.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!

globalEvents.name: Mission Ends - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You're captured again and held in higher security as you're transported to Kessel. Thankfully, after a couple of weeks of hard labor, Rebel High Command launches a full-scale operation. Rogue Squadron performs magnificently, and you are freed alongside sorne highranktng rebel officers.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 2. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 100 credits per hero to prevent this.

globalEvents.name: Escape
globalEvents.eventText:
"I've got the ship parked near the garbage disposal," you're told by your rescuer, "but you've got to hack into their system and open the passages. Whatever you do, hurry! I'm keeping
them busy, but I don't know if I can for much longer."

{-} Imperial mission tokens represent closed passageways and Rebel mission tokens represent open passageways. A hero can interact with a terminal to flip all Imperial mission tokens of the color corresponding to that terminal.
{-} A figure can interact with a red Rebel mission token to place his figure in any empty space on the Trash Compactor.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move or to interact with the equipment cache.
{-} The doors in the Storage Room and Hallway are locked. A door adjacent to an Imperial figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-}  If all heroes are on or adjacent to the yellow Rebel tokens, click "Depart" on the token to win the mission.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

entityProperties.name: Red Terminal
entityProperties.theText: The terminal controls the access hatches to the Trash Compactor.

entityProperties.name: Equipment Cache
entityProperties.theText:
Your equipment is stored in this cache.

A hero can interact with this cache to flip his Item cards faceup. Once all heroes have flipped their cards faceup, click Equipment Recovered to progress the mission.

{-} A figure can interact with a red Rebel mission token to place his figure in any empty space on the Trash Compactor.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move or to interact with the equipment cache.
{-} The doors in the Storage Room and Hallway are locked. A door adjacent to an Imperial figure does not block his movement or line of sight.
{-}  If all heroes are on or adjacent to the yellow Rebel tokens, click "Depart" on the token to win the mission.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Find a way to open the hatches to the Trash Compactor.

You attempt to hack into the terminal.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} to the test for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The security systems protecting the terminal are too strong. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Garbage Chute Opens
globalEvents.eventText: The garbage chute slides open. This could be your way to freedom!

entityProperties.name: Yellow Imperial Token 1
entityProperties.theText: The exit from the Trash Compactor is closed shut. It can only be opened from a yellow terminal.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Imperial Token 2
entityProperties.theText: The exit from the Trash Compactor is closed shut. It can only be opened from a yellow terminal.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Rebel Token 1
entityProperties.theText:
The exit from the Trash Compactor is open. This is your way to escape!

{-} If all heroes are on or adjacent to the yellow Rebel tokens, click Depart to win the mission.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Rebel Token 2
entityProperties.theText:
The exit from the Trash Compactor is open. This is your way to escape!

{-} If all heroes are on or adjacent to the yellow Rebel tokens, click Depart to win the mission.

entityProperties.theText: The door is locked shut.

entityProperties.name: Storage Room Door
entityProperties.theText: The door is locked shut.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText: This terminal controls the garbage chute that leads out of the Trash Compactor.

eventActions.theText:

{-} If all heroes are on or adjacent to the yellow Rebel tokens, click "Depart" on the token to win the mission.

globalEvents.name: Climb down
globalEvents.eventText: You climb down into the hole and soon find yourself surrounded by garbage. What an incredible smell you've discovered!

eventActions.theText: Open the garbage chute in the Trash Compactor.

{-} A hero can interact with this token to place his figure in any empty space on the Trash Compactor.
